name: Custom
description: Make your own movement using low-level movement functions.

conditions.name: Is moving
conditions.description: True when the object is moving.

conditions.name: Compare speed
conditions.description: Compare the current speed of the object.

params.name: Which
params.description: Choose the speed to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose the way to compare the speed.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The speed, in pixels per second, to compare to.

conditions.name: On step
conditions.description: Triggered when stepping the object for motion.

conditions.name: On horizontal step
conditions.description: Triggered when stepping the object horizontally for motion.

conditions.name: On vertical step
conditions.description: Triggered when stepping the object vertically for motion.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

actions.name: Set angle of motion
actions.description: Set the angle the object is currently moving at.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The new angle of motion, in degrees.

actions.name: Rotate clockwise
actions.description: Rotate the angle of motion in a clockwise direction.
actions.display_text: Rotate {my} angle of motion clockwise [i]{0}[/i] degrees

params.name: Angle
params.description: Amount to rotate clockwise, in degrees.

actions.name: Rotate counter-clockwise
actions.description: Rotate the angle of motion in a counter-clockwise direction.
actions.display_text: Rotate {my} angle of motion counter-clockwise [i]{0}[/i] degrees

params.name: Angle
params.description: Amount to rotate counter-clockwise, in degrees.

params.name: Axes
params.description: Choose which axes to reverse on.

params.name: Which
params.description: Choose the speed to set.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The new speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

actions.name: Accelerate
actions.description: Accelerate the object forwards or on an axis.

params.name: Which
params.description: Choose which way to accelerate.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The acceleration, in pixels per second per second.

actions.name: Accelerate toward angle
actions.description: Accelerate the object at an angle.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The acceleration, in pixels per second per second.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle, in degrees, to accelerate toward.

actions.name: Accelerate toward position
actions.description: Accelerate the object toward a position.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The acceleration, in pixels per second per second.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate in the layout to accelerate toward.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate in the layout to accelerate toward.

actions.name: Stop stepping
actions.description: Stop the current stepping, preventing any more step triggers firing this tick.

params.name: Position
params.description: Choose the resulting object position.

actions.name: Push out solid
actions.description: Push the object to a space if it is overlapping a solid.

params.name: Direction
params.description: Choose the method of push out.

actions.name: Push out solid at angle
actions.description: Push the object to a space at an angle if it is overlapping a solid.
actions.display_text: Push {my} out of solid at angle {0}

params.name: Angle
params.description: Angle, in degrees, to push the object out at.

expressions.name: Speed
expressions.description: The current object speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: MovingAngle
expressions.description: The current angle of motion, in degrees.

expressions.name: dx
expressions.description: The current X component of motion, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: dy
expressions.description: The current Y component of motion, in pixels per second.
